mapper.select: select distinct t1.* from sys_role t1 left join sys_role_user t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id where t2.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct t1.* from sys_permit t1 left join sys_role_permit t2 on t1.permit_id = t2.permit_id left join sys_role_user t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id where t3.user_id = #{userId} order by t1.permit_sort, t1.permit_id
select distinct t1.* from sys_permit t1 left join sys_role_permit t2 on t1.permit_id = t2.permit_id where t2.role_id = #{roleId} order by t1.permit_sort
